#summary list of features
#labels Featured

= Features =
 * General
  * Main
    * generate folders from config file (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * generate files from config file (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * generate content in files from config file (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * generate new config file from existing filetree (_since version 1.6.0.0_)
  * Confirmation dialog (_since version 1.4.6.0_)
  * Starparameter (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
   * -c,--config {{{<arg>}}}     Config file (*.foldergenconf) (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
   * -cn,--create          Create a new foldergenconf with existing folders and files (_since version 1.6.0.0_)
   * -co,--confirmation    Require confirmation in command line mode before FolderGen writes to disk (_since version 1.4.6.0_)
   * -d,--debug            Show debug prints (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
   * -g,--gui              Use GUI (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
   * -h,--help             Show this help entry (_since version 1.4.0.0_)
   * -l,--locale {{{<arg>}}}     Configure the language (_since version 1.4.6.0_)
   * -o,--overwrite {{{<arg>}}}  Overwrite folder and files (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
   * -p,--plugins {{{<arg>}}}    Use plugins (_since version 1.4.9.0_)
   * -px,--proxy           Use proxy (_since version 1.5.0.0_)
   * -r,--root {{{<arg>}}}       Create folders and files here (_since version 1.4.6.0_)
  * Translations
   * English (_since version 1.4.5.0_)
   * German (_since version 1.4.5.0_)
   * French (_since version 1.4.5.0_)
   * Russia (_since version 1.4.5.0_)
   * Italian (_since version 1.6.0.0_)
  * Generator
   * markers to replace content in files (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${user.name} - returns the username (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${user.homedir} - returns the user home dir (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${system.os} - returns the operating system (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${file.currentdir} - returns the current dir (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${file.name} - returns the current filename (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.year} - returns the current year as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.month} - returns the current month as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.day} - returns the current day as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.hour} - returns the current hour as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.minute} - returns the current minute as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.second} - returns the current second as decimal (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.isleap(YEAR)} - returns true or false (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${date.formatcurrent([Format FORMAT])} - returns the current formatted date/time (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${func.counter(VAR)} - counter for a VAR (_since version 1.2.0.0_)
    * ${func.counter(VAR|STARTNUMBER)} - counter for a VAR with startnumber STARTNUMBER (_since version 1.4.7.0_) 
    * ${func.getfilecontent(filepath)} - return the content of the given file (_since version 1.4.8.0_) 
   * Plugins (_since version 1.4.9.0_)
    * Replace text in content (_since version 1.4.9.0_)
    * new files (_since version 1.5.0.0_)
    * new folders (_since version 1.5.0.0_)
    * new files with content (_since version 1.5.0.0_)
  * foldergenconf
   * foldergenconf filetypes (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * File (-) (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * Folder (+) (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
    * Copy / Download (~) (_since version 1.4.8.0 / 1.5.0.0_)
    * Zip (>) (_since version 1.6.0.0_)
 * GUI (_since version 1.3.0.0_)
  * System Look and Feel (_since version 1.4.5.0_)
  * Additional treeview to ... 
   * ... view the config file (_since version 1.6.0.0_)

 * Console (_since version 1.0.0.0_)
